about_the_game:
Show your day one support for the liberation of Rockhaven with the It's Only Money Founders Pack!

The Box Knight Pack
Don the armor made from the finest cardboard in the Undercity. Every citizen will know "That person is truly from the sewer" when they see you coming in this outfit. Access and equip the Box Knight apparel from any wardrobe in the city or property you own.

Gold Hotdog Man asbestOS Statue
Place a monument to Rockhavens greatest hero, Hotdog Man, in any home you own by using the asbestOS terminal. Covered in mostly real gold, it's sure to impress friends and tenants alike.

CrookBook Verified Blue Tick
Sure, you're from the sewer, but what's more important than paying to let people know you matter on social media. Whether it's in-game chat, crookbook minigames or simply in your inventory screen, your name will have this illustrious blue tick beside it. Everyone will know: What you say matters.
